Articles.Content:
Is it possible for raster propmonitor to show scansat info from other space craft dedicated to scanning?  Do I just need to establish an orbital communication network for this info to be related?

This is in regards to raster propmonitor showing "no satellite connection" on one of the screens..  

**edit: this should've been in ksp1 mod discussion..  Sorry**..

Edited September 4, 2023 by Anodizer
Thread moved from KSP 2 Mod Discussions to KSP 1 Mod discussions.
